dict.acceptation: 充满活力的；活泼的；充满趣味的；
轻快地：轻快地，富有活力地；轻快地跳起；

sent.orig: I like lonely, lonely hate it, I yearn for a lively, but most fear lively.
sent.trans: 我喜欢孤独，却又痛恨孤独，我向往着热闹，却最害怕热闹。

sent.orig: I propose holding a lively face-to-face debate and avoid any covert politics.
sent.trans: 我主张采取辩论的方法，面对面，不要背靠背，好好辩论辩论。

sent.orig: She is lively, impetuous and very warmhearted.
sent.trans: 她愉快，急燥而心地善良。

sent.orig: The old man is still vigorous and lively.
A person who has a lively personality generally makes a good teacher.
sent.trans: 性格活泼的人往往能成为一个好教师。
